title: Action cache does not work after shutdown when sibling layout is enabled

labels.name: team-Core
labels.description: Skyframe, bazel query, BEP, options parsing, bazelrc

body:
### Description of the bug:


When ` --experimental_sibling_repository_layout` is enabled, the action cache would cease to work for external repositories and Bazel would recompile most targets after a `bazel shutdown`.

### What's the simplest, easiest way to reproduce this bug? Please provide a minimal example if possible.


```shell
mkdir -p a

touch a/WORKSPACE

cat > a/BUILD <<EOF
cc_binary(name="a", srcs=["a.cc"], deps=["b"])
cc_library(name="b", includes=["."], hdrs=["b.h"])
EOF

cat > a/a.cc <<EOF
#include "b.h"

int main(void) {
  return B_RETURN_VALUE;
}
EOF

cat > a/b.h <<EOF
#define B_RETURN_VALUE 31
EOF

cat > ./WORKSPACE <<EOF
local_repository(
    name = "a",
    path = "a",
)
EOF
```

Then run:

```shell
bazel build --experimental_sibling_repository_layout @a//:a -s
bazel shutdown
bazel build --experimental_sibling_repository_layout @a//:a -s
```

Notice that `a.cc` was compiled again in the second invocation.

### Which operating system are you running Bazel on?


Linux

### What is the output of `bazel info release`?


6.1.0

### If `bazel info release` returns `development version` or `(@non-git)`, tell us how you built Bazel.


_No response_

### What's the output of `git remote get-url origin; git rev-parse master; git rev-parse HEAD` ?


_No response_

### Have you found anything relevant by searching the web?

This is the same behavior as https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/2490 - just with the added sibling layout.

### Any other information, logs, or outputs that you want to share?

_No response_
